summary: Chanel is a famous French fashion brand started by Coco Chanel in 1910. It makes high-end clothes, accessories, and luxury items for women. The company is owned by two French brothers and has its main office in London. Chanel is known for its perfume, Chanel No. 5, and a stylish suit. Coco Chanel changed fashion by making clothes that were comfortable and practical but still very stylish, instead of the tight, restrictive clothes that were popular at the time.
title: Chanel
